UData\Widgets
namespace
UData\Widgets
UData\Widgets\Widget

Widget interface.

Functions
SetOptions
public function SetOptions(
WidgetOptions $opts
)

Used to set options for the widget after initialization

parameters:

UData\Widgets\WidgetOptions $opts

A required options object defining the options for the widget.

Display
public function Display()

Calling this should produce output to the stream representing the widget

ToString
public function ToString()

This method should return a string instead of sending it to the stream, representing the widget.

returns:

string
